title: [Bug]: DM chats history not working.
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Direct message chat history with some users is not loading

### What package are you using?

snap

### Version

2.0.7 on Kubuntu 24.04.2

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Open App
1.1. There are no latest chat with user with whom you are chatting a few minutes ago.
2. By trying to start DM chat with user the chat history is not displaying in chat window
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown

```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

The bug is not reproducing for Android, Web(or PWA)
